'''18w32a''' is the fourth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13.1]], released on August 8, 2018,<ref>{{snap|18w32a|August 8, 2018}}</ref> which adds dead coral and some other features, changes some existing features, optimizes performance, and fixes many bugs.

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''{{Animate|Dead Tube Coral JE1 BE1.png; Dead Brain Coral JE1 BE1.png; Dead Bubble Coral JE1 BE1.png; Dead Fire Coral JE1 BE1.png; Dead Horn Coral JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Dead coral]]'''
* Dead variants of corals.
* Can be placed on top of blocks.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Statistics]]'''
* New statistics:<ref>[https://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/95m844/minecraft_snapshot_18w32a/e3ur1aj/ Reddit Comment] by developer [[Rockenroll4life]]</ref>
** "Damage Dealt (Absorbed)" – <code>damage_dealt_absorbed</code>
** "Damage Dealt (Resisted)" – <code>damage_dealt_resisted</code>
** "Damage Blocked By Shield" – <code>damage_blocked_by_shield</code>
** "Damage Absorbed" – <code>damage_absorbed</code>
** "Damage Resisted" – <code>damage_resisted</code>
** "Shulker Box Cleaned" – <code>clean_shulker_box</code>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Coral]]'''
* Can now be placed in air.
** Unless adjacent to water, they turn into dead coral after a short moment.

'''[[Purpur stairs]] and [[purpur slab|slab]]s'''
* Can now be crafted using [[purpur pillar]]s.

=== Items ===
'''[[Bone meal]]'''
* When used in water of warm ocean biomes, it now has a chance to grow [[coral fan]]s.

=== General ===
* Performance has been optimized.
